entry.title: WIND WARNING, Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 p.m. MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0Â°C

Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 12:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 after midnight then southwest 70 gusting to 100 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
